metadata.title: CVE-2015-1426 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Puppet Labs Facter 1.6.0 through 2.4.0 allows local users to obtainssensitive Amazon EC2 IAM instance metadata by reading a fact for an AmazonEC2 node.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1426` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

facter - 2.4.4-1
libfacter3.11.0 - 2.4.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: facter package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.4-1').
